data.title: Turkey Avocado Cobb
data.text:
This was my first time eating at Schlotzsky's. I know shame on me. I tried the turkey avocado cobb, a surprisingly good salad with black beans, tomatoes, goat cheese, eggs, and croutons. My plan when I arrived was to get this salad without the beans because I was thinking who puts beans in a salad but that plan went out the window. After one look and one bite, I was hooked. I loved it. I purchased sweet tea to wash it all down and now look forward to my next visit. 

I encourage more visitors to stop by this convenient location on N Belt Line Rd. It's clean and the staff are very friendly.

data.title: Good Sandwiches
data.text:
I picked up some sandwiches for take out at the Schlotzsky's off of Beltline in Grand Prairie.  A little confusion for the staff since I was using an electronic coupon but they got it figured out pretty quick.

The sandwiches were ready in just a couple minutes.  I had a Pastrami and Swiss and an Original...both sandwiches were very good.

This location is a little older but was clean and efficient.
